content: When you've completed the challenge of the spiked golden ball that rolls along the Ashen Pass III, you can return to the path. The firewall that was previously there will now have disappeared, and you can enter the Cooling Slope.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Flint Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
When you've completed the challenge of the spiked golden ball that rolls along the Ashen Pass III, you can return to the path. The firewall that was previously there will now have disappeared, and you can enter the Cooling Slope.
